Paragraph: The hole mobilities of the POBDTPD and PEBDTPD polymers were estimated to be 1.5 × 10^-4 and 1.3 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 , respectively.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The hole mobilities of the POBDTPD and PEBDTPD polymers were estimated to be 1.5 × 10^-4 and 1.3 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| hole mobilities of POBDTPD and PEBDTPD polymers |
| hole mobility of POBDTPD |
| hole mobility of PEBDTPD |
| 1.5 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 (hole mobility of POBDTPD) |
| 1.3 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 (hole mobility of PEBDTPD) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| hole mobilities of POBDTPD and PEBDTPD polymers |
| hole mobility of POBDTPD (material property) |
| hole mobility of PEBDTPD (material property) |
| 1.5 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 (hole mobility of POBDTPD) |
| 1.3 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 (hole mobility of PEBDTPD) |

The entities "POBDTPD and PEBDTPD polymers" are not considered material properties, but rather the specific types of polymers being referred to. The material properties are the hole mobilities of those polymers.
